title: 84: The Carb-Slashing Episode
itunes:title: The Carb-Slashing Episode
description: Get ready, because we’re slashing carbs in today’s episode of Chew The Right Thing! Lisa has  tips, tricks, and swaps for high-carb foods like rice, noodles, bread, and fries! Plus, tortilla substitutes including one that is so unique and tasty, you’re going to flip over it! But that’s not all… The gang has some creative ways to slim down America’s favorite food...PIZZA! This episode has so much info, you may have to listen twice! And when you’re done, head on over to our Foodcast page for recipes and food finds mentioned in the episode.
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
